title: Flutter Basics
description: Learn the fundamentals of Flutter development from scratch

lessons.title: Introduction to Flutter
lessons.content:
Flutter is Google's UI toolkit for building beautiful, natively compiled applications for mobile, web, and desktop from a single codebase. Created in 2017, Flutter has quickly become one of the most popular frameworks for cross-platform development.

Flutter uses Dart programming language and provides a rich set of pre-built widgets that make it easy to create stunning user interfaces. The framework's hot reload feature allows developers to see changes instantly, making development faster and more enjoyable.
keyPoints: Cross-platform development with a single codebase

lessons.title: Widgets Deep Dive
lessons.content:
In Flutter, everything is a widget! Widgets are the building blocks of Flutter applications. There are two main types of widgets: StatelessWidget and StatefulWidget.

StatelessWidget is immutable and doesn't change over time, while StatefulWidget can change dynamically based on user interaction or data changes. Understanding widgets is crucial to mastering Flutter development.

lessons.title: Layouts and Positioning
lessons.content: Flutter provides powerful layout widgets to arrange UI elements on the screen. Common layout widgets include Column, Row, Stack, Container, and more. Understanding how these work together is essential for creating complex UIs.
keyPoints: Column and Row for linear layouts
Flexible and Expanded for responsive design

title: Dart Mastery
description: Master the Dart programming language from beginner to advanced

lessons.title: Variables and Types
lessons.content:
Dart is a strongly-typed programming language that supports both static and dynamic typing. Learn about primitive types like int, double, String, and bool, as well as complex types like List, Map, and custom classes.

Dart also features type inference with the 'var' keyword, making code more concise while maintaining type safety.

lessons.title: Functions and Methods
lessons.content: Functions are first-class citizens in Dart. You can assign them to variables, pass them as arguments, and return them from other functions. Dart supports named parameters, optional parameters, and arrow syntax for concise function definitions.

title: UI/UX Design Principles
description: Create beautiful and user-friendly mobile app interfaces

lessons.title: Design Fundamentals
lessons.content: Good design is about more than just aesthetics‚Äîit's about creating intuitive, accessible, and delightful user experiences. Learn the core principles of visual hierarchy, color theory, typography, and spacing.

title: State Management
description: Master state management patterns in Flutter applications

lessons.title: Introduction to State
lessons.content: State management is one of the most important concepts in Flutter development. State refers to data that can change over time and affects what's displayed on screen. Learn about different state management solutions like Provider, Riverpod, Bloc, and GetX.

title: Flutter Animations
description: Bring your apps to life with smooth, engaging animations

lessons.title: Animation Basics
lessons.content: Animations make apps feel alive and responsive. Flutter provides powerful animation APIs including implicit animations, explicit animations, and hero animations. Learn how to create smooth, performant animations that enhance user experience.
